message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG

This paper deals with image processing and computer vision techniques for cloud segmentation. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves graphics and visualization techniques, which makes cs.GR (Computer Graphics) another likely category. The use of multi-exposure fusion and radiance maps suggests that the paper could also belong to cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also involves image enhancement techniques, which could place it in cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper proposes a new method for cloud segmentation, which could be of interest to researchers in cs.LG (Machine Learning).
